divs: Sighting DetailsHuge slow moving UFO spotted in the himalayan mountains, mt. kailash . It was in that place for over 6 hours. These photographs sent by my friend to me.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bengaluru
There was one other sighting in Bengaluru on or around April 22nd 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Huge slow moving UFO spotted in the himalayan mountains, mt. kailash
